description:
Kay is a part of a Pokémon show where she provides the voiceover to her Raichu.
Kay and her Raichu were very nervous with each other at first with Raichu`s cheeks sparking when it got nervous and then Kay would flinch at the thought of a potential thundershock.
They both got over their nervousness of each other and went on to perform together in the Pokémon Showboat`s performances.
name: Kay
